title: Try to use ntex-mqtt in tokio run time and it cause ICE.

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code The reproducible case is https://github.com/lsk569937453/rust-issue. ```Rust git clone git@github.com:lsk569937453/rust-issue.git cargo run ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.2 (9eb3afe9e 2023-03-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0 commit-date: 2023-03-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.2 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_codegen_llvm/src/debuginfo/metadata/type_map.rs:133:13: type metadata for unique ID 'VariantStructType([async fn body@src/main.rs:54:50: 66:2], 0, HiddenZst)' is already in the `TypeMap`! thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/9eb3afe9ebe9c7d2b84b71002d44f4a0edac95e0/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1609:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fdcb68dc59a -
